scripts.generate: prisma generate && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'node_modules','.prisma'); const dest=path.join(process.cwd(),'node_modules','@prisma','client','.prisma'); try { if (fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true}); console.log('Copied .prisma -> @prisma/client/.prisma'); } else { console.log('Skip copy: no node_modules/.prisma found'); } } catch (e) { console.error('Copy .prisma failed:', e); process.exit(0); }"
